content: what is  arXiv <--> MNR abstracts \"reverse lookup\"?

ArXiv <--> MNR Abstracts "reverse lookup" refers to a service or tool that allows users to find the corresponding arXiv preprint(s) for a specific abstract published in the Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society (MNRAS). This functionality enables researchers to easily locate the original preprint version of a paper that was later published in MNRAS.
